member.name: T:GrapeCity.Documents.Drawing.GcBitmapGraphicsExt
member.summary: Provides extension methods that allow rendering HTML on a .

member.name: M:GrapeCity.Documents.Drawing.GcBitmapGraphicsExt.DrawHtml(GrapeCity.Documents.Imaging.GcBitmapGraphics,System.String,System.Single,System.Single,GrapeCity.Documents.Drawing.HtmlToImageFormat,System.Drawing.SizeF@,System.Int32,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Draws an HTML string on this at a specified position.
member.param: The target object.
The HTML string to draw.
The x-coordinate at which to draw the HTML block.
The y-coordinate at which to draw the HTML block.
The formatting attributes.
OUT: the size of the rendered HTML block.
The number of milliseconds to wait before deeming the page to be ready.
A whitelist for Negotiate Auth servers, such as "*example.com".
A proxy server, such as "https://proxy-ip:proxy-port".
member.returns: True if the drawn block is not empty, false otherwise.

member.name: M:GrapeCity.Documents.Drawing.GcBitmapGraphicsExt.DrawHtml(GrapeCity.Documents.Imaging.GcBitmapGraphics,System.Uri,System.Single,System.Single,GrapeCity.Documents.Drawing.HtmlToImageFormat,System.Drawing.SizeF@,System.Int32,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Draws an HTML page provided by an URI on this at a specified position.
member.param: The target object.
The URI specifying the source HTML page.
The x-coordinate at which to draw the HTML block.
The y-coordinate at which to draw the HTML block.
The formatting attributes.
OUT: the size of the rendered HTML block.
The number of milliseconds to wait before deeming the page to be ready.
A whitelist for Negotiate Auth servers, such as "*example.com".
A proxy server, such as "https://proxy-ip:proxy-port".
member.returns: True if the drawn block is not empty, false otherwise.

member.name: T:GrapeCity.Documents.Drawing.HtmlToImageFormat
member.summary: Represents the formatting attributes for rendering HTML to .

member.name: M:GrapeCity.Documents.Drawing.HtmlToImageFormat.#ctor(System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary:
Initializes a new instance of .
If is true, the resulting image size will be calculated automatically to include all page content. The minimal size will be determined by .
If is false, the maximum resulting image size will be determined by and (possibly clipping some content).
member.param: Specifies whether to render the whole page.
Specifies whether to trim image margins.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.Documents.Drawing.HtmlToImageFormat.MaxTopMargin
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum height of the top margin, in pixels. Negative value prevents trimming the top margin. Defaults to 0 (no top margin).

member.name: P:GrapeCity.Documents.Drawing.HtmlToImageFormat.MaxBottomMargin
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum height of the bottom margin, in pixels. Negative value prevents trimming the bottom margin. Defaults to 0 (no bottom margin).

member.name: P:GrapeCity.Documents.Drawing.HtmlToImageFormat.MaxLeftMargin
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum width of the left margin, in pixels. Negative value prevents trimming the left margin. Defaults to 0 (no left margin).

member.name: P:GrapeCity.Documents.Drawing.HtmlToImageFormat.MaxRightMargin
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum width of the right margin, in pixels. Negative value prevents trimming the right margin. Defaults to 0 (no right margin).

member.name: P:GrapeCity.Documents.Drawing.HtmlToImageFormat.DefaultBackgroundColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the background color to be used if the HTML page doesn't specify one. Defaults to White color.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.Documents.Drawing.HtmlToImageFormat.FullPage
member.summary:
Gets or sets a value indicating whether the full HTML page should be captured.
Note that if this property is true, , and are ignored.
Conversely, if this property is false, is ignored.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.Documents.Drawing.HtmlToImageFormat.WindowSize
member.summary:
Gets or sets the minimal window size before trimming margins, in pixels. Defaults to 800 x 600.
Note that this property is ignored if is false.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.Documents.Drawing.HtmlToImageFormat.MaxWindowWidth
member.summary:
Gets or sets the maximum window width, in pixels. Defaults to 1200.
Note that this property is ignored if is true.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.Documents.Drawing.HtmlToImageFormat.MaxWindowHeight
member.summary:
Gets or sets the maximum window height, in pixels. Defaults to 1600.
Note that this property is ignored if is true.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.Documents.Drawing.HtmlToImageFormat.Clip
member.summary:
If set, captures the specified rectangular region only (in pixels).
Note that this property is ignored if is true.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.Documents.Drawing.HtmlToImageFormat.Scale
member.summary: Gets or sets the scale factor. Defaults to 1.0.

member.name: T:GrapeCity.Documents.Html.GcHtmlRenderer
member.summary: Provides methods for converting HTML to PDF and images.

member.name: F:GrapeCity.Documents.Html.GcHtmlRenderer.LastLogMessage
member.summary: Gets the last log message from the headless Chromium shell.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.Documents.Html.GcHtmlRenderer.PathToGcHtmlToPdf
member.summary: Gets or sets path to the headless Chromium shell.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.Documents.Html.GcHtmlRenderer.WaitDuration
member.summary: Gets or sets the amount of time, in milliseconds, to wait for the browser process to exit.

member.name: M:GrapeCity.Documents.Html.GcHtmlRenderer.SetGcPdfLicenseKey(System.String)
member.summary:
Sets a GcPdf license key to use by all instances of .
Up to five PDFs can be created without a license.
member.param: The GcPdf license key to set.

member.name: M:GrapeCity.Documents.Html.GcHtmlRenderer.ApplyGcPdfLicenseKey(System.String)
member.summary:
Applies a GcPdf license key to use by the current instance of .
Up to five PDFs can be created without a license.
member.param: The GcPdf license key to apply.

member.name: M:GrapeCity.Documents.Html.GcHtmlRenderer.SetGcImagingLicenseKey(System.String)
member.summary:
Sets a GcImaging license key to use by all instances of .
Up to five images can be created without a license.
member.param: The GcImaging license key to set.

member.name: M:GrapeCity.Documents.Html.GcHtmlRenderer.ApplyGcImagingLicenseKey(System.String)
member.summary:
Applies a GcImaging license key to use by the current instance of .
Up to five images can be created without a license.
member.param: The GcImaging license key to apply.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of from .

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of from HTML string.

member.name: M:GrapeCity.Documents.Html.GcHtmlRenderer.Dispose
member.summary: Clean up any resources being used.

member.name: M:GrapeCity.Documents.Html.GcHtmlRenderer.Finalize
member.summary: Performs cleanup operations on unmanaged resources.

member.name: M:GrapeCity.Documents.Html.GcHtmlRenderer.Dispose(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Performs cleanup operations on managed and unmanaged resources.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.Documents.Html.GcHtmlRenderer.IsDisposed
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the has been disposed of.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.Documents.Html.GcHtmlRenderer.VirtualTimeBudget
member.summary: Gets or sets the number of milliseconds to wait before deeming the page to be ready.
member.remarks: For determinism virtual time does not advance while there are pending network fetches (i.e no timers will fire). Once all network fetches have completed, timers fire and if the system runs out of virtual time is fastforwarded so the next timer fires immediately, until the specified virtual time budget is exhausted.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.Documents.Html.GcHtmlRenderer.AuthServerWhitelist
member.summary:
Gets or sets a whitelist to passthrough Windows authentication for the specified domains.
For example: "*example.com,*foobar.com,*baz".

member.name: P:GrapeCity.Documents.Html.GcHtmlRenderer.ProxyServer
member.summary:
Gets or sets a proxy server, overrides system settings. Affects HTTP and HTTPS requests only.
For example: "https://proxy-ip:proxy-port" or "socks5://127.0.0.1:1080".

member.name: M:GrapeCity.Documents.Html.GcHtmlRenderer.RenderToGcBitmap(GrapeCity.Documents.Imaging.GcBitmap,GrapeCity.Documents.Drawing.HtmlToImageFormat)
member.summary: Renders the source HTML to an existing .
member.param: The destination .Note that its current content will be lost.
The formatting attributes.
member.returns: True if HTML was successfully rendered; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:GrapeCity.Documents.Html.GcHtmlRenderer.RenderToPng(System.IO.Stream,GrapeCity.Documents.Html.PngSettings)
member.summary: Creates a PNG image from the source HTML and saves it to a specified stream.
member.param: The destination stream.
The set of parameters for the output image.
member.returns: True if PNG was successfully saved; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:GrapeCity.Documents.Html.GcHtmlRenderer.RenderToPng(System.String,GrapeCity.Documents.Html.PngSettings)
member.summary: Creates a PNG image file from the source HTML.
member.param: The destination file path.
The set of parameters for the output image.
member.returns: True if the browser process has exited; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:GrapeCity.Documents.Html.GcHtmlRenderer.RenderToJpeg(System.IO.Stream,GrapeCity.Documents.Html.JpegSettings)
member.summary: Creates a JPEG image from the source HTML and saves it to a specified stream.
member.param: The destination stream.
The set of parameters for the output image.
member.returns: True if JPEG was successfully saved; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:GrapeCity.Documents.Html.GcHtmlRenderer.RenderToJpeg(System.String,GrapeCity.Documents.Html.JpegSettings)
member.summary: Creates a JPEG image file from the source HTML.
member.param: The destination file path.
The set of parameters for the output image.
member.returns: True if the browser process has exited; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:GrapeCity.Documents.Html.GcHtmlRenderer.RenderToPdf(System.IO.Stream,GrapeCity.Documents.Html.PdfSettings)
member.summary: Creates a PDF document from the source HTML and saves it to a specified stream.
member.param: The destination stream.
The set of parameters for the output PDF.
member.returns: True if PDF was successfully saved; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:GrapeCity.Documents.Html.GcHtmlRenderer.RenderToPdf(System.String,GrapeCity.Documents.Html.PdfSettings)
member.summary: Creates a PDF file from the source HTML.
member.param: The destination file path.
The set of parameters for the output PDF file.
member.returns: True if the browser process has exited; otherwise, false.

member.name: T:GrapeCity.Documents.Html.ImageSettings
member.summary: The abstract base class for and classes.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.Documents.Html.ImageSettings.DefaultBackgroundColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the background color to be used if the HTML page doesn't specify one. Defaults to White color.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.Documents.Html.ImageSettings.FullPage
member.summary:
Gets or sets a value indicating whether the full HTML page should be captured. Defaults to false.
Note that if this property is true, is ignored.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.Documents.Html.ImageSettings.WindowSize
member.summary:
Gets or sets the virtual window size, in pixels. Defaults to 800 x 600.
Note that if is true, this property defines the minimal window size.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.Documents.Html.ImageSettings.Clip
member.summary:
If set, captures the specified rectangular region only (in pixels).
Note that this property is ignored if is true.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.Documents.Html.ImageSettings.Scale
member.summary: Gets or sets the scale factor. Defaults to 1.0.

member.name: T:GrapeCity.Documents.Html.PngSettings
member.summary: Represents output image settings for rendering HTML to PNG.

member.name: T:GrapeCity.Documents.Html.JpegSettings
member.summary: Represents output image settings for rendering HTML to JPEG.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.Documents.Html.JpegSettings.CompressionQuality
member.summary: Gets or sets the compression quality (from 0 to 100). Defaults to 80.

member.name: T:GrapeCity.Documents.Html.PdfSettings
member.summary: Represents output settings for rendering HTML to PDF.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.Documents.Html.PdfSettings.TaggedPdf
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether a tagged (accessible) PDF is generated. Defaults to true.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.Documents.Html.PdfSettings.DefaultBackgroundColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the background color to be used if the HTML page doesn't specify one. Defaults to White color.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.Documents.Html.PdfSettings.DisplayBackgroundGraphics
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the background graphics should be rendered. Defaults to true.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.Documents.Html.PdfSettings.WindowSize
member.summary: Gets or sets the virtual window size, in pixels. Defaults to 800 x 600.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.Documents.Html.PdfSettings.Scale
member.summary: Gets or sets the scale factor, from 0.1 to 2.0. Defaults to 1.0.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.Documents.Html.PdfSettings.FullPage
member.summary:
Gets or sets a value indicating whether the whole HTML page should be rendered as a single PDF page. Defaults to false.
Note that if this property is true, the following properties are ignored: , , , , , , , and .

member.name: P:GrapeCity.Documents.Html.PdfSettings.Landscape
member.summary:
Gets or sets a value indicating whether the paper orientation is Landscape. Defaults to false.
Note that this property is ignored if is true.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.Documents.Html.PdfSettings.PageWidth
member.summary:
Gets or sets the page width, in inches. If unspecified, 8.5 inches is used.
Note that this property is ignored if is true.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.Documents.Html.PdfSettings.PageHeight
member.summary:
Gets or sets the page height, in inches. If unspecified, 11 inches is used.
Note that this property is ignored if is true.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.Documents.Html.PdfSettings.IgnoreCSSPageSize
member.summary:
Gets or sets a value indicating whether the CSS-defined page size should be ignored. Defaults to false.
Note that this property is ignored if is true.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.Documents.Html.PdfSettings.Margins
member.summary:
Gets or sets page margins, in inches. Defaults to no margins.
Note that this property is ignored if is true.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.Documents.Html.PdfSettings.PageRanges
member.summary:
Gets or sets the range of pages to render, e.g., '1-5, 8, 11-13'. Defaults to all pages.
Note that this property is ignored if is true.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.Documents.Html.PdfSettings.DisplayHeaderFooter
member.summary:
Gets or sets a value indicating whether the header and footer are rendered. Defaults to false.
Note that this property is ignored if is true.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.Documents.Html.PdfSettings.HeaderTemplate
member.summary: Gets or sets the HTML template for the page header. This should be a valid HTML markup that may include the following special classes used to inject print values: 'date' formatted print date 'title' document title 'url'document location 'pageNumber' current page number 'totalPages' total pages in the document For example, "" would generate a span containing the document title.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.Documents.Html.PdfSettings.FooterTemplate
member.summary: Gets or sets the HTML template for the page footer. This should be a valid HTML markup that may include the following special classes used to inject print values: 'date' formatted print date 'title' document title 'url'document location 'pageNumber' current page number 'totalPages' total pages in the document For example, "" would generate a span containing the document title.

member.name: T:GrapeCity.Documents.Pdf.HtmlToPdfFormat
member.summary: Represents the formatting attributes for rendering HTML to .

member.name: M:GrapeCity.Documents.Pdf.HtmlToPdfFormat.#ctor(System.Boolean)
member.summary:
Initializes a new instance of .
If is true, the resulting size will be calculated automatically to include all page content.
If is false, the maximum resulting size will be determined by and (possibly clipping some content).
member.param: Specifies whether to render the whole page.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.Documents.Pdf.HtmlToPdfFormat.DefaultBackgroundColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the background color to be used if the HTML page doesn't specify one. Defaults to White color.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.Documents.Pdf.HtmlToPdfFormat.DisplayBackgroundGraphics
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the background graphics should be rendered. Defaults to true.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.Documents.Pdf.HtmlToPdfFormat.WindowSize
member.summary: Gets or sets the virtual window size, in pixels. Defaults to 800 x 600.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.Documents.Pdf.HtmlToPdfFormat.Scale
member.summary: Gets or sets the scale factor, between 0.1 and 2.0. Defaults to 1.0.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.Documents.Pdf.HtmlToPdfFormat.FullPage
member.summary:
Gets or sets a value indicating whether the full HTML page should be rendered.
Note that if this property is true, and are ignored.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.Documents.Pdf.HtmlToPdfFormat.MaxPageWidth
member.summary:
Gets or sets the maximum page width, in inches. If unspecified, 200 inches is used.
Note that this property is ignored if is true.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.Documents.Pdf.HtmlToPdfFormat.MaxPageHeight
member.summary:
Gets or sets the maximum page height, in inches. If unspecified, 200 inches is used.
Note that this property is ignored if is true.
